dict.string: Select Unit to Enhance
Select Unit to Enhance
Enhance Units
Select Material

<font color="red">Contains 1 or more Rare or higher units.</font>
Material units are lost after fusion. Continue?

<font color="red">Includes Limit Break units.</font>
These units cannot be recovered. Proceed?

<font color="red">Includes combinations that will not raise Bug count.</font>
Proceed?

<font color="red">Limit Break max reached.</font>
Proceed?

<font color="red">Result will not exceed max Limit Break.</font>
Some materials will be wasted. Proceed?

<font color="red">Unable to Limit Break further.</font>
Proceed?

<font color="red">You are about to use material that exceeds the unit's max Limit Break value.</font>
Some materials will be wasted. Proceed?

<font color="red">Base unit's skill level is already at max.</font>
Proceed with fusion anyway?

<font color="red">You are about to use material that exceeds the base unit's max skill level.</font>
Some materials will be wasted. Proceed?

<font color="red">Unit's Bugs are already at max.</font>
Proceed?

<font color="red">You are about to use material that exceeds the unit's max Bug value.</font>
Some materials will be wasted. Proceed?

<font color="red">The unit has already reached its max Level Limit Break value. </font>
Proceed with fusion anyway?

<font color="red">You are about to use material that exceeds the unit's max Level Limit Break value.</font>
Some materials will be wasted. Proceed with fusion anyway?

<font color="red">You are about to use limited Level Limit Break material beyond its limit.</font>
Some materials will be wasted. Proceed with fusion anyway?
<font color="red">Includes unit with Mod on enhancement unit. Mods will be automatically converted to materials.</font> Continue?
Units used as material will be consumed. Continue?
Unit Level is at MAX. Awaken unit?
Unit is at max level. Continue?
This unit has reached its Max Level. Proceed to Level Limit Break?

<font color="red">Includes unit with relased Mod slot</font>
Units used as material will be consumed. Continue?

<font color="red"> Units with unlocked Potentials included. Deep-Log will be lost.</font>
Continue?

<font color="red">Includes Level Limit Break unit(s). Level Limit will not be carried over. </font>
Proceed with fusion anyway?
Unit cannot be enhanced further. Use caution when using materials.
This unit is not available for Level Limit Break.
You don't own materials needed for Level Limit Break.
ATK
Life
REC
Alc
Trans
HALF
MAX
At Lv.%d,
Level Limit Break up to Lv.%d.
OK
Back
Autofusion settings canceled.

Let's try enhancing units. First, select a <font color='yellow'>unit</font> to enhance.
This time, we prepared a unit for enhancing. Let's enhance this unit.
Select a unit to be used as <font color='yellow'>material</font>.
When enhancing units with material, we have to switch tabs
Since we have a unit for material, Let's use it.

As your unit's level increases it's <font color='yellow'>status</font> also increases.
There are special materials that can increase a unit's level.
Let's try using materials.
Go to Materials.
<font color='yellow'>Metal Ducks</font> can help gain experience when used as material. For better results, use material with the same attribute as the target unit.
You can select multiple materials Choose the maximum amount.

You can enhance<font color='yellow'> Skill Level</font> to strengthen unit's power.
Try to enhance this unit's Skill Level.
Next, select the material now!

You can use <font color='yellow'>Alchemy Fruit</font> to enhance Skill Level.
Try to select more than one material to enhance Skill Level to Max!
Try to get Alchemy Fruit!

About<font color='yellow'> Limit Break</font>. Enhance unit's stats to strengthen unit's power.
Try to enhance this unit's stats!
Next, select the material now!

Use <font color='yellow'>Attack Fruit,Healing Fruit, Vitality Fruit</font>
Try to use Attack Fruit to strengthen ATK now!
You can select more than one fruit at once. Click + to use 10 fruits at once.
You can auto-select materials to enhance unit to maximum stats.
Automatically selected! Try to use these materials to strengthen the unit!

ATK +99 ! Moreover, you can use <font color='yellow'>Transcendent Fruit lt</font> to strengthen unit futher than +99! Try to use <font color='yellow'>Transcendent Fruit</font> to strengthen status to +100
Try to select <font color='yellow'>Transcendent Fruit.</font>
It's all ready to ATK+100! Use <font color='yellow'>Attack Fruit</font> to strengthen ATK to +100.
Try to get Transcendent Fruit!

About<font color='yellow'> Ability unlocking.</font> You can unlock a unit's Abilities to strengthen unit's power.
Let's try to unlock this unit's Ability.
Please select the material.

<font color='yellow'>To unlock more Abilities, </font> you have to increase unit's<font color='yellow'> BUG </font>to a certain level. You can use the same unit as the material to increase unit's BUG.
Try to use the required material we have prepared for you.

In addtion to consuming the same unit, you can also use BUG materials to increase a unit's BUG.
We have prepared the required material for you this time. Please select the<font color='yellow'> Nurupon.</font>
Currently in use for Enigma Quest, cannot be selected.
Challenge
Skip

Now you can challenge the Strengthen Unit tutorial quest. Try to challenge?
If you skip the tutorial, the units available in the tutorial will be sent directly to the folder.
Skip the tutorial.

Now you can challenge the Limit Break tutorial quest. Try to challenge?
If you skip the tutorial, the units available in the tutorial will be sent directly to the folder.
Skip the tutorial.

Now you can challenge the Unit Skill tutorial quest. Try to challenge?
If you skip the tutorial, the units available in the tutorial will be sent directly to your folder.
Skip the tutorial.

Now you can challenge the Unlocking Ability tutorial quest. Try to challenge?
If you skip the tutorial, the units available in the tutorial will be sent directly to your folder.
Skip the tutorial.

You can challenge a tutorial on Level Limit Break. Proceed?
If skipped, the status that are enhanced in the tutorial will be reflected immediately.
You've skipped the Level Limit Break tutorial.
BUG UP Material
Not enough materials for MAX Enhancement.
Not enough Bits for MAX Enhancement.
Not enough materials for Enhancement.
Not enough Bits for Enhancement.

Custom Enhacement is unset.
Register your preference via Custom Enhancement button.
The unit has reached Lv.99. Let's raise the Level Limit to further enhance the unit.

Here, you can break the unit's Level Limit. Once you perform a Level Limit Break, the unit's Level Limit will be lifted and can be enhanced beyond <font color='yellow'>Lv.99.</font>
Let's try raising the Level Limit.

Next, choose a material.
For Level Limit Break, <font color='yellow'>special materials</font> are required. This time, we have prepared the required unit and material for you, so select them.

The unit's Level Limit has reached 100. If the Level Limit has just been raised, the unit will remain the same strength as before. Raise unit's level from Unit Enhancement to further enhance the unit.
About Level Limit Break
